card_landmark_utility:
Get a special decoration
For example: in the future Digital Showroom, you can use special themes, wallpapers, cabinets to decorate your room, which will make your NFT more tasteful and scarce.
label_landmark_introduction: Otters are great nimble homebuilders, and this spectacular bush colony is constantly being refurbished and expanded. Whether you are on a journey or on your way home, "Bush Village" is an important place with special meaning for adventurers: use your creativity to decorate your space and show it off to others!
